# General Info

This script contains the parameter recovery of the Multi-attribute attentional DDM with stating point bias of our manuscript "Domain Specific Effects of Hunger on Attention and Choice". It requires JAGS and the dwiener module. The script is structured s follows:
1. **Preparation:** loading libraries and creating theme for figure and possibility to load our workspace
2. **Set-up Parameter Recovery:** simulate data with parameters 
3. **Fit simulated data:** to check if similar parameters are yielded and correlate recovered with true parameters
4. **Plot** and calculate corrleations of true and recovered parameters

# 2 Set-Up: parameter Recovery 2Phi Model
**Goal:** Simulated data would yield the same parameters
**How:**Draw samples from distribution
```{r}
#function for simulation (this is just copy-pasted from below with minor changes; so, rtdists package is used to simulated the DDM)
pr_sim_maaDDM2phisp_discount <- function(parameters,attribute1A,attribute1B,attribute2A,attribute2B,subject,fixProps){
  
  #extract free parameters; note that order of parameters follows rtdists, not dwiener
  boundarySeparation <- parameters[1]
  ndt <- parameters[2]
  drift <- parameters[3]
  weight <- parameters[4]
  theta <- parameters[5]
  phi1 <- parameters[6] 
  phi2 <- parameters[7] 
  startingPoint <- parameters[8]*boundarySeparation #don't forget: sp is NOT relative in rtdists (but it is in dwiener)
  
  #compute trial-wise value difference
  valueDifference <- fixProps[,1]*(weight*(attribute1A-theta*attribute1B)+(1-weight)*phi2*(attribute2A-theta*attribute2B))+
                     fixProps[,2]*(weight*(theta*attribute1A-attribute1B)+(1-weight)*phi2*(theta*attribute2A-attribute2B))+
                     fixProps[,3]*(weight*phi1*(attribute1A-theta*attribute1B)+(1-weight)*(attribute2A-theta*attribute2B))+
                     fixProps[,4]*(weight*phi1*(theta*attribute1A-attribute1B)+(1-weight)*(theta*attribute2A-attribute2B))

  #Simulate the DDM and store choices and RTs
  nTrials <- length(valueDifference)
  choices <- rep(NA, nTrials)
  rts <- rep(NA, nTrials)
  for (i in 1:nTrials) {
    result <- rdiffusion(1,boundarySeparation,drift*valueDifference[i],ndt,startingPoint)
    
    choices[i] <- ifelse(result$response == "upper", 2, 1)  
    rts[i] <- result$rt
  }
  pr_data_2phi<-cbind(subject, choices, rts, attribute1A, attribute1B, attribute2A, attribute2B, fixProps)

    # Return the choices and RTs
  return(pr_data_2phi)
}

#generate posterior predictives (loop over samples taken, subjects, conditions)
nPostPred <- 1 
ppSample <- sample(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$n.sims,nPostPred) #draw samples from posterior (without replacement)
ppDat_JAGS_hungry_choices <- matrix(NA,nrow = sum(H==1),ncol = nPostPred)
ppDat_JAGS_sated_choices <- matrix(NA,nrow = sum(H==0),ncol = nPostPred)
ppDat_JAGS_hungry_rts <- matrix(NA,nrow = sum(H==1),ncol = nPostPred)
ppDat_JAGS_sated_rts <- matrix(NA,nrow = sum(H==0),ncol = nPostPred)
conflictTrials_hungry = c()
conflictTrials_sated = c()
for (p in 1:nPostPred){
  x = ppSample[p] #current sample
  simDat_JAGS_hungry<-data.frame(choices = numeric(), rts = numeric())
  simDat_JAGS_sated<-data.frame(choices = numeric(), rts = numeric())
  for  (s in (unique(data_discount_sated$subject))){
    sInJAGS <- which(uID==s)
    for (t in 1:2){
      if (t == 1){ #session-specific stuff up front; note that order of parameters follows rtdists, not dwiener
        sub <- data_discount_hungry[data_discount_hungry$subject == s, ] #hungry
        parameters <- c(log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound_H[sInJAGS])),
                      log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt_H[sInJAGS])),
                      log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift_H[sInJAGS])),
                      pnorm(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1_H[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta_H[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy_H[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2_H[sInJAGS]),
                      pnorm(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp[sInJAGS]+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp_H[sInJAGS]))
      } else {
        sub <- data_discount_sated[data_discount_sated$subject == s, ] #sated
        parameters <- c(log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound[sInJAGS])),
                      log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt[sInJAGS])),
                      log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift[sInJAGS])),
                      pnorm(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy[sInJAGS]),
                      (maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2[sInJAGS]),
                      pnorm(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp[sInJAGS]))
      }

      #arrange input data
      delayAi <- sub$time_left2
      delayBi <- sub$time_right2
      
      subjecti <- sub$subject
      ntrialsi <- nrow(sub)
      #recode everything into delay vs. amount choice
      delayL <- (delayAi>delayBi) #whether impatient option was left
      amountA_s <- sub$value_left*(delayL==T)+sub$value_right*(delayL==F)
      amountB_s <- sub$value_left*(delayL==F)+sub$value_right*(delayL==T)
      delayA_s <- sub$time_left2*(delayL==T)+sub$time_right2*(delayL==F)
      delayB_s <- sub$time_left2*(delayL==F)+sub$time_right2*(delayL==T)
      
      fixProp1_s <- sub$delayleft_time/(sub$delayleft_time+sub$delayright_time+sub$amountleft_time+sub$amountright_time) #delay left
      fixProp2_s <- sub$delayright_time/(sub$delayleft_time+sub$delayright_time+sub$amountleft_time+sub$amountright_time)#delay right
      fixProp3_s <- sub$amountleft_time/(sub$delayleft_time+sub$delayright_time+sub$amountleft_time+sub$amountright_time)#amount left
      fixProp4_s <- sub$amountright_time/(sub$delayleft_time+sub$delayright_time+sub$amountleft_time+sub$amountright_time)#amount right
    
      fixProps <- matrix(c(fixProp1_s*(delayL==T)+fixProp2_s*(delayL==F),fixProp1_s*(delayL==F)+fixProp2_s*(delayL==T),
                   fixProp3_s*(delayL==T)+fixProp4_s*(delayL==F),fixProp3_s*(delayL==F)+fixProp4_s*(delayL==T)),ncol=4)
      
      #rescale delay and amount values to lie between 1 and 10 (as in Yang & Krajbich)
      amountA_s <- (1+((amountA_s-min(amountA_s))*(10-1))/(max(amountA_s)-min(amountA_s)))
      amountB_s <- (1+((amountB_s-min(amountB_s))*(10-1))/(max(amountB_s)-min(amountB_s)))
      delayA_s <- (1+((delayA_s-min(delayA_s))*(10-1))/(max(delayA_s)-min(delayA_s)))
      delayB_s <- (1+((delayB_s-min(delayB_s))*(10-1))/(max(delayB_s)-min(delayB_s)))
      
      #take only trials with fixations
      validTrials <- which((is.na(fixProps[,1])==0)|(is.na(fixProps[,2])==0)|(is.na(fixProps[,3])==0)|(is.na(fixProps[,4])==0))
      delayA_s <- delayA_s[validTrials]
      delayB_s <- delayB_s[validTrials]
      amountA_s <- amountA_s[validTrials]
      amountB_s <- amountB_s[validTrials]
      subjecti <- subjecti[validTrials]
      fixProps <- fixProps[validTrials,]
      

      #simulate
      simDat <- pr_sim_maaDDM2phisp_discount(parameters,delayA_s,delayB_s,amountA_s,amountB_s,subjecti,fixProps)
      if (t==1){
        simDat_JAGS_hungry <- rbind(simDat_JAGS_hungry, simDat)
      } else {
        simDat_JAGS_sated <- rbind(simDat_JAGS_sated, simDat)
      }
    }
  }
  ppDat_JAGS_hungry_choices[,p] = simDat_JAGS_hungry$choices
  ppDat_JAGS_hungry_rts[,p] = simDat_JAGS_hungry$rts
  ppDat_JAGS_sated_choices[,p] = simDat_JAGS_sated$choices
  ppDat_JAGS_sated_rts[,p] = simDat_JAGS_sated$rts
  
  flush.console()
  msg = sprintf('Done with posterior predictive sample: %d',p)
  print(msg)
}
```


# 3 Fit 2Phi Modell
## 3.1 Prepare sim data hungry
```{r}
simDat_JAGS_hungry<-simDat_JAGS_hungry %>% 
  mutate(response=recode(choices, '2'=1, '1'=0))
simDat_JAGS_sated<-simDat_JAGS_sated %>% 
  mutate(response=recode(choices, '2'=1, '1'=0))

#loop over subjects to get the data and arrange it in the order needed
uID <- unique(simDat_JAGS_hungry$subject)
delayA <- c()
delayB <- c()
amountA <- c()
amountB <- c()
fixProp1 <- c()
fixProp2 <- c()
fixProp3 <- c()
fixProp4 <- c()
RT <- c()
H <- c() #whether trial is hungry (1) or sated (0)
P <- c() #participant number (from 1 till nsubj, so 1, 2, 3, 4, ..., nsubj)

for (s in (unique(simDat_JAGS_hungry$subject))){
  #loop over sessions (1 = hungry)
  for (t in 1:2){
    if (t == 1){ #session-specific stuff up front
      sub <- simDat_JAGS_hungry[simDat_JAGS_hungry$subject == s, ] #hungry
    } else {
      sub <- simDat_JAGS_sated[simDat_JAGS_sated$subject == s, ] #sated
    }
    
    response <- sub$response
    rt_s <- sub$rts
    rt_s[response==0] = -rt_s[response==0] #dwiener function in JAGS wants "negative" rt if choice == 0
    delayA_s <- sub$attribute1A
    delayB_s <- sub$attribute1B
    amountA_s <- sub$attribute2A
    amountB_s <- sub$attribute2B
    ntrialsi <- nrow(sub)
    fixProps <- sub[, c("V8", "V9", "V10", "V11")]
    
    #fill in "all-subject" vectors
    delayA <- c(delayA,delayA_s)
    delayB <- c(delayB,delayB_s)
    amountA <- c(amountA,amountA_s)
    amountB <- c(amountB,amountB_s)
    fixProp1 <- c(fixProp1,fixProps[,1])
    fixProp2 <- c(fixProp2,fixProps[,2])
    fixProp3 <- c(fixProp3,fixProps[,3])
    fixProp4 <- c(fixProp4,fixProps[,4])
    RT <- c(RT,rt_s)
    H <- c(H,rep(t==1,length(rt_s)))
    P <- c(P,rep(which(uID==s),length(rt_s)))
  }
}

delayA <- (1+((delayA-min(delayA))*(10-1))/(max(delayA)-min(delayA))) 
delayB <- (1+((delayB-min(delayB))*(10-1))/(max(delayB)-min(delayB)))
amountA <- (1+((amountA-min(amountA))*(10-1))/(max(amountA)-min(amountA)))
amountB <- (1+((amountB-min(amountB))*(10-1))/(max(amountB)-min(amountB)))


N <- length(RT)
S <- length(unique(simDat_JAGS_hungry$subject))
```

## 3.2 maaDDM2 +sp Function
```{r}
# get data and initial values together and specify the model
ddmData <- list('N'=N,'S'=S,'P'=P,'H'=H,'attribute1A'=delayA,'attribute1B'=delayB,'attribute2A'=amountA,'attribute2B'=amountB,'RT'=RT,
                'fixProp1'=fixProp1,'fixProp2'=fixProp2,'fixProp3'=fixProp3,'fixProp4'=fixProp4)


#starting values
nChains <- 8

#parallel computing apparently not possible
T1<-Sys.time()
recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount <- jags.parallel(ddmData,inits = NULL,#jags.seed = sample(100:999,1),
                    parameters.to.save = c('mu_bound','sigma_bound','mu_ndt','sigma_ndt',
                                           'mu_drift','sigma_drift','mu_weight1','sigma_weight1',
                                           'mu_theta','sigma_theta','mu_phy','sigma_phy','mu_phy2','sigma_phy2','mu_sp','sigma_sp',
                                           'mu_bound_H','sigma_bound_H','mu_ndt_H','sigma_ndt_H',
                                           'mu_drift_H','sigma_drift_H','mu_weight1_H','sigma_weight1_H',
                                           'mu_theta_H','sigma_theta_H','mu_phy_H','sigma_phy_H','mu_phy2_H','sigma_phy2_H','mu_sp_H','sigma_sp_H',
                                           'bound','ndt','drift','weight1','theta','phy','phy2','sp',
                                           'bound_H','ndt_H','drift_H','weight1_H','theta_H','phy_H','phy2_H','sp_H'),
                    model.file = "BayesModel_maaDDM_sp_2Phi.txt",working.directory = 'BayesModels',
                    n.chains = nChains, n.iter = 60000, n.burnin = 30000,n.thin = 12, DIC = TRUE,jags.module = c("glm","dic","wiener"))
T2<-Sys.time() #T2-T1

# check convergence
ddmRhats <- recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$summary[,8] #check with max(Rhats), which should ideally be < 1.01 (1.05 would also be okay)
max(ddmRhats) # 1.005
recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$DIC # 66031.75


save(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount, file = "param_recov_2phi_sp_discount.RData")
```


# 4 Plot
## 4.1 calculate correlations
```{r}
#correlations sated and hungry for each parameter: bound, ndt, starting point, taste weight, drift, theta and phi1 & phi2
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$ndt_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$sp_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$weight1_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$theta_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$phy2_H)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift)
cor(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift_H, maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$drift_H)

# make some graphs!!
```

## 4.2 Set up graphs
```{r}
# a) Boundary seperation
bound_rec <- data.frame(
  rec_sated = log(1+exp(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound)),
  true_sated = log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound)),
  rec_hungry = log(1+exp(recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound+recov_maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound_H)),
  true_hungry = log(1+exp(maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound+maaDDM2phisp_discount$BUGSoutput$mean$bound_H))

# Plot
```
